compounddef.initializer: template<typename Type> concept Ikarus::FEAffordance = std::is_same_v<std::remove_cvref_t<Type>, ScalarAffordances> or std::is_same_v<std::remove_cvref_t<Type>, VectorAffordances> or std:: is_same_v<std::remove_cvref_t<Type>, MatrixAffordances> or std::is_same_v<std::remove_cvref_t<Type>, AffordanceCollectionImpl>

briefdescription.para: Concept to check if a given type is one of the predefined affordance enums or the AffordanceCollectionImpl.
